attributes.action: Divert funding from the armed force to the nhs and educational system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a country do not need the trident missile system or our large army to defend are selves. we could spend billions of pounds on the NHS and School system and pull money and troops out from the MANY warzones we are currently in. many of the countrys we send the army to would have reason or even the abillity to attack so why to we send our own citezens to die for no good reason.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
